key_features: Up to 10% cash rebates on your daily essentials when you dine, shop online or purchase groceries
50% off family attractions and other exclusive deals
Save up to 20.1% on fuel at SPC

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.

eligibility: Spend a minimum of S$800 within the first 60 days from the date of Card approval.

fees.annual_interest_rate: Prevailing interest rate of 27.8% p.a. (subject to compounding if the charges are not repaid in full) on the transaction amount, chargeable on a daily basis from the date of transaction until receipt of full payment. (Minimum charge: S$2.50)
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the amount withdrawn per transaction or S$15, whichever is higher
